Articles.Content:
Hey all,

Just incase this might be useful to someone, here's a PHP script I wrote to read in my savegame file:

PHP Code:

http://mkv25.net/showcase/ksp/ksp_parser_v0.1.zip

Demo:

http://mkv25.net/showcase/ksp/ksp_parser.php

I thought maybe it could be used to make a website where people upload their save files and it draws maps and diagrams and things.

Best regards,

- Markavian
Hey, this is great! And exactly the kind of thing I was looking for. Do you have any release license for this? I think this should go on Github for community enhancing, or something similar.
